snippet: Indictments on charges of possession of contraband have been filed against 14 inmates in connection with videos showing prisoners brazenly using drugs, drinking beer and flashing a loaded gun in the New Orleans jail.
abstract: Indictments on charges of possession of contraband have been filed against 14 inmates in connection with videos showing prisoners brazenly using drugs, drinking beer and flashing loaded gun in New Orleans jail.
lead_paragraph: Indictments on charges of possession of contraband have been filed against 14 inmates in connection with videos showing prisoners brazenly using drugs, drinking beer and flashing a loaded gun in the New Orleans jail.

headline.main: Louisiana: Video of New Orleans Jail Leads to Charges
headline.print_headline: Louisiana: Video of New Orleans Jail Leads To Charges
